Shelby's Tea House

Welcome to the Tea House!

Thanks for stopping by. I'm Rohit, and I've been drinking tea as a mindful practice for several years. I'm a student of tea, continuously learning on my travels. I'm a teacher by profession, so I'm always excited at an opportunity to share tea with someone new. The proceeds from this experience allow me to source new and exciting teas for every season!

Questions? Text me!

In the press

I recently got some press coverage! WEKU did a story on the art of tea in Kentucky, and they interviewed me and two of the guests on that day!
